I don't understand Japanese i deduced it after reading this marvelous hentai over 11 times ( yes i have been waiting for complete translation ( which is still ongoing) over 2 years ) . Hana Hook is breaking her own levels in this hahaoya shikkaku universe the first one being least fucked up and this one being most . This is without any doubt the best ntr manga ever written. The epilogue of this series ,only, is better than sanbun kyoden's any work ( including sayuki no sato) , bai asuka's any work , miito shido's any work , tanaki aji's any work. This is a very hardcore ntr which cannot be enjoyed by even hardcore fans of ntr ( see i did such good wordplay ; )) . If you know then can you tell me when will hana hook drop her new bomb. Thank you for wasting your time .

As the day ends kanta waits for return of nemoto along with a passed out miwako who he has tied hands of . As soon as nemoto enters miwako wakes up and tells nemoto she did as he told her . Kanta then tells kanta to move out. Kanta is seen weeping with a knife in his hand , which means . Kanta succeed in killing nemoto and probably also accidentally ( as he is seen saying he has to kill nemoto only) kill miwako or miwako kills herself ( either way she ded ) . Then shino and megumi kills themselves as they can't live without nemoto ( not knowing what happened to the kid of megumi ) . In the end arima becomes the priest and kanta servent at shrine ( we can also see a glimpse of 5 tombstones in the end ) . And arima says something about kanta .

So he asks her will she run with him out of this hell hole, she refuses and says she can't . Kanta gets angry and pins him ontoo the wall and as soon as he removes her underwear he sees a tattoo with initials Ne( for nemoto ) she says she can't run away as she is propeety of nemoto . This gets kanta angry and he starts to spank her at the tattoo to remove the initials . As soon as he fondles her tits it starts lactating , confused kanta asks why is she milking. Miwako tells that she is pregnant with boy child of nemoto who when she gives birth to will become her new master and make her his sex slave . She further tells kanta that she eould havr never had sex with a brat like kanta . Kanta becomes devastated.

Now in epilogue.
Impressed by kanta's good work nemoto gives him a reward by letting him meet miwako again after two years . He is very happy about it. As soon as miwako sees him she retaliates by trying to run away but is jerked as she is treated like a bitch with leash against her neck. Nemoto says that if she want to keep her son with herself she has to have sex with kanta . Which she happily accepts . Kanta is overjoyed as he thinks his mother loves him. So he has sex with miwako over the night . And asks her if she loves him she says that she loves him as she has given birth to him.

I now understand the whole ending . Spoilers. The mother miwako becomes sex slave of nemoto (slave no. 5). The priest dies between the original and epilogue. The loli megumi becomes wife of nemoto (slave no. 1) . The granny shino becomes a toilet as she is unable to conceive children (slave no. 3). The gay boy arima becomes a persuader for girls as he is beautiful ( slave no. 2 ). The boy kanta becomes the lowest slave  ( no. 6 ) and is made to do all the work at shrine. He is only able to have sex with arima which is sold online. Shino does taxes ( basically ) and acts like a toilet for  all males except ( probably ) kanta . Megumi becomes the only mother and thus is wife of nemoto and is treated with respect. Miwako is basically made a painslut who lives somewhere away ( not in shrine's main building) and all the boys put out their fetishes on her ( but only uses toys not has sex with her ) .
This is easily one of the worst. I hope this artist gets help.
